tuv.seg: 0分钟到5分钟，包括5分钟，分数为零。
From zero to five minutes, inclusive, no points were given.
10分钟到15分钟，包括15分钟，得分是两分。
From ten to fifteen, inclusive, two points would be given.
25分钟到30分钟，包括30分钟，得分是五分。
All the way up to twenty-five to thirty minutes where all five points would be awarded.
5分钟到10分钟的范围，包括10分钟，得分是一分。
From five to ten minutes, inclusive, it was one point.
<t1/>那他也太可怜了，遇上了不负责的长辈。”
Then he's really too pitiful to have met such an irresponsible elder."

Chapter 451: Old Eagle
‘狗’的脑门霎时出现暴怒的符号。
Signs of violent rage instantly emerged on the forehead of the 'dog'.
“不好，那家伙以前就只会欺负我。”
"No way, that guy only ever bullies me."
“不对，他之前似乎也有踢中几个人，不止十一人。”
“No, he kicked a couple of people off before as well, so it’s not just eleven.”
“不要闹事，这里可是苍盟的地盘。”老者的声音在他耳边淡淡的响起。
"Don't make a fuss, this is the Cang Association's territory." The elderly man's voice faintly resounded beside his ears.
“不过三次挑战必须使用一次，否则视违规，要扣一个积分。”
"However, you have to use at least one of your three challenges, otherwise you break the rules, resulting in one pint being deducted."
“为什么？”
"Why?"
“为什么？”游小默又问。
"Why?" You XiaoMo asked.
“五长老，您怎么看？”坐在冬<t0/>霖<t1/>旁边的叶导师开口说道。
“Fifth Elder, what do you think?” Mentor Ye, who was sitting next to Dong Lin, asked.
“人家根本不理你，真是有够丢人的！”
"Other people are totally ignoring you. This is truly shameful!"
“什么事？”
"What is it?"
“他刚刚将十一人踢下擂台，这么说他已经得到两分了，这是混战的最高分吧？”
“He just kicked eleven people off the arena, that means he’s obtained two points. That’s the highest score so far, right?”
“他好厉害啊！”
“Holy crap he’s strong!”
“他是游青云，游震天的二孙子，据说是赤血家族年轻一辈最厉害的人，他应该才是游震天真正宠爱的孙子，听闻游震天对他的要求非常严格，是不是听他去出危险的任务，所以很多人才会以为游震天不喜欢这个孙子。”对赤血家族的成员非常了解的凌霄见他在看游青云便解释道。

"He is You AingYun, You ZhenTian's second grandson. It's said that he's the most powerful amongst the younger generation of the Vermillion Blood Clan. He should be the grandson that You ZhenTian truly dotes on. I've heard that You ZhenTian's demands towards him are very strict, and would often assign dangerous missions to him, so many assumed that You ZhenTian did not like this grandson." Ling Xiao, who understood the members of the Vermillion Blood Clan extremely well, explained when he saw him watching You QingYun.
“他的红卡到底是怎么来的？”柴正恨恨的说道。
“Where did he get that red card?” Chai Zheng muttered as he seethed.
“你——”青年气急。
"You - -" The youth saw red.
“你——”麟昊武怒指着他，眼睛却瞪着凌霄：“不要以为你朋友是麒麟族就可以在本少爷面前嚣张，惹恼了我，就算他回到麒麟族，我也有办法让他在麒麟族过不下去。”

"You - " Lin HaoWu pointed at him in fury, yet his eyes were staring at Ling Xiao. "Don't think that just because your friend is from the Qilin Clan you can run rampant in front of this young master. If you offend me, I still have ways to make his life difficult in the Qilin Clan even if he returns back to the Qilin Clan.
“你不用帮他说好话。”
"Don't speak for him."
“你们不用担心，我不介意，就这样，我先走了。”
"Don't worry, I don't mind. Alright, I'll be leaving now."
“你们在这里做什么？”
“What are you guys doing here?”
“你们有多少？”
"How much do you have?"
“你听错了。”凌霄面无表情的说道，“刚刚只有有只狗在叫而已，不用理它。”
"You got it wrong." Ling Xiao expressionlessly replied, "It was just a dog barking just now, there's no need to bother about it."
“你是在眶我吗？”银戈不悦地道。
"Are you trying to frame (眶) me?" Yin Ge asked in displeasure.
“你笑什么？”麟昊武被他笑得怒火越来越大。
"What are you laughing for?" Lin HaoWu's rage was burning brighter and brighter at being laughed at.
“你若不愿意，那便算了，我可不想无缘无故惹一身骚。”银戈作势要走。
"If you're not willing, then we can forget it. I dont wish to attract a whole lot of trouble for no reason." Yin Ge turned and was about to walk away.
“你说什么，还要付一个积分？”
"What did you say? We have to pay a point?"
“你说什么？”男子目光寒光。
"What did you say?" The man's gaze went cold.
“你说谁有病？”麟昊武嚯的站起来。
"Who did you say is sick?!" Lin HaoWu stood up.
“你这是要去哪里？”天心见他一副要外出的样子，便问道。
"Where are you going?" Tian Xin asked, seeing that he seemed to intend to head out.
“做什么？”
"What?"
“关于第二轮比赛，大家已经知道了，在我身后便是接下来你们要测试的重力屋，等一下老夫会让人给你们每人发放一颗传送石，当你们之中有人承受不了重力时，只要轻轻的捏碎传送石就能传送出来。”五长老看着众人说道。

“Now you all know about the second round. Behind me lies the Gravity Room where the competition will occur. In a moment, I will give you each a transport stone. If you are unable to take the gravitational force inside, you simply have to crush the stone and you will be transported out,” the Fifth Elder informed them.
“凡是不是绝对的，如果有缘分的话，四灵帝王兽与人类订立本命契约也不是不可能的。”
"Not all things are absolute. If it is fated, the Four Divine Emperor Beasts setting up a lifebound contract with humans is not impossible.
“别哭，他不喜欢你是他的损失，你可是驭兽工会的天心大小姐，追你的人多的是，我们不能让别人看不起是不是？”
"Don't cry. It's his loss if he doesn't like you. You're Lady Tian Xin of the Beast Transfiguration Guild. There are plenty of people pursuing you. You can't let others see you like this, no?"
“原来是……你啊，请问你有什么事吗？”游小默尴尬地笑了笑，他隐约记起来了，但是已经忘记她的长相，不过那时她应该还只是一名<t0/>五级丹师吧<t1/>。

“Oh, so it’s…you. Is there anything you want?” You XiaoMo smiled with a hint of awkwardness. He vaguely recalled that incident, but had forgotten her appearance. At that time, she was probably still a level five mage.
“双鱼酒楼好像有几位管事，像武成和这个胖子，应该都是管事的儿子，难免嚣张。”凌霄也不是很清楚。
ShuangYu Hotel seems to have several directors, of which Wu Cheng and this fat kid are both sons of. It's normal that they'd be arrogant." Ling Xiao wasn't very clear on it either.
“双鱼酒楼有很多少爷吗？”游小默好奇的问道。
"Does the ShuangYu Hotel have many young masters?" You XiaoMo asked curiously.
“叫我天心就好了。”听到游小默叫自己，天心立刻转阴为晴，含情脉脉的看着他。
"Just call me Tian Xin." Hearing You XiaoMo address her, Tian Xin's mood immediately rose, looking at the other with adoration.
“可以。”
"Of course."
“后果便是输，输了要降到下面的楼层。”
"It counts as a loss. If you lose, then you'll be moved to a lower level."
“呃……”游小默不知道怎么回答他这个问题。
“Uh…” You XiaoMo had no idea how to respond.
“呃，我和程向荣只是路过而已。”颜辉急忙撇清关系。
"Er, Cheng XiangRong and I just passed by, that's all," Yan Hui hurried to find an excuse for them.
“呵呵，麒麟族和妖凰族每次见面总是这么热闹。”
"Hehe, every time I see the Qilin Clan and the Demon Phoenix Clan, they're always so lively."
"Eh?"
"Ah!"
“多谢。”游小默拿回玉瓶，顿了顿又问：“请问你们楼里有卖制作空间符的黑玉吗？”
"Thank you." You XiaoMo took the vial back and hesitated for a moment before asking, "Could you tell me if there's any black jade for teleportation talismans being sold in the tower?"
“大少爷遇上克星了！”
"The eldest young master has met his nemesis!"
“大概吧。”
"Probably."
“天心姑娘。”
"Miss Tian Xin."
“太白，是你！”姬凤深深的皱起眉。
"Tai Bai, it's you!" Ji Feng frowned deeply.
“好吧，看在你是赤血家庭的弟子的份上，我就替你传个话，但是……”银戈假装被他的诚意打动。
"Okay, seeing that your a disciple of the Vermilion Blood Clan, I will convey your message, but... ..." Yin Ge pretended to be moved by his sincerity.
“如何？”青年见老者放到手中的灵草，便紧张的问道。
"How is it?" The young man asked nervously, looking at the magic herb in the elder's hand.
“如果只是这样，那就不是喜欢了，你只是纯粹对他有好感罢了，两者是不一样的，听我的<t0/>话，他并不适合你，等你将来遇到对的人，你就会知道，那个人才是你一直在等的人。”乔无星碰碰她的脸颊。

"If that's why, then that isn't love. You just have positive feelings for him. The two are different. Listen to me. He isn't suited to you. When you meet the right person in the future, you'll know that that's the person you've been waiting for all along." Qiao WuXing patted her cheek.
“如果大家没有问题的话，那便开始吧，有一点要记住，进入重力屋之前，用你们的卡在门口的石壁凹槽刷一下，重力屋自然会将你们的信息记录进去，接下来一个一个进。”五长老淡淡的扫了众人一眼。

“If no one else has any more questions, then let’s start. Remember to swipe your card on the slot beside the door before you go in. That way, the Gravity Room will automatically record your achievements. Now, everyone will go in one by one.” The Fifth Elder swept everyone with his gaze.
“如果我不取消自己的名字，到时有人挑战我，我没出赛，还有不挑战别人，会有什么后果？”
"If I don't remove my name and someone challenges me but I don't attend or challenge anyone else, what will happen?"
“姬凤，妖凰族果然把你派来了。”青年吐出一句咬牙切齿的话。
"Ji Feng, so the Demon Phoenix Clan really sent you." The youth spat out his sentence as he gnashed his teeth.
“小子，你胆子可真大，竟然敢打伤我哥哥，真是了不起啊！”
"Brat, you really are rather brave. You dare to hurt my older brother, impressive!"
“就这样？”
"Just like that?"
“就这脾性，亏你还是十神之一的强者，就这肚量，背地里嘲笑你的人肯定只多不少。”游小默小声的嘀咕道。

"With your attitude, I'm surprised you're still one of the Ten Gods. With your magnanimity, I'm certain that people are more likely to laugh at you behind your back than not," You XiaoMo quietly muttered.
“张少，你放心，这枚空间符一定是你的。”肥仔旁边一狗腿很是殷勤的对他露出献媚的笑容。
"Don't worry, young master Zhang, this teleportation talisman is definitely yours." A few sycophants around the man attentively smiled at him in a clear attempt to suck up to him.
“当然。”乔无星肯定的点点头。
"Of course." Qiao WuXing nodded in certainty.
“怎么可能，凭你的实力，怎么可能接得下我的刀？”独眼刀疤震惊的瞪大眼睛，口中喃喃自语，他向来对自己的<t0/>刀非常<t1/>自信。

"How is this possible? How could someone of your strength possibly block my sword?" One-Eyed Scarface widened his eyes in shock, muttering to himself. He was always very confident in the power of his sword.
“怕是不仅如此吧。”五长老冬<t0/>霖<t1/>摸了摸黑得发亮的胡子，神色平静，“那灵丹除了是六级上品灵丹，就连品质也是上品，他用的灵草应该是上品灵草，看来这一轮比赛的第一名，非他莫属了！”

“That’s not all,” Fifth Elder Dong Lin stroked his shiny black beard, calm as can be, “That pill isn’t just a high grade level six pill, but it’s also of a high quality. He used high quality magic herbs. Seemed like victory is fated to be his!”
“恐怕不止是这样而已，一场比赛，她竟然用上品灵草炼丹，看来她是真的很想赢游小默。”一名导师惊叹的说道，视线同时移到游小默身上。

“That’s not all. She even used high quality magic herbs to refine this pill in this competition, it seems like she really wants to win You XiaoMo,” a mentor expressed in shock, moving his gaze to You XiaoMo.
“我可以解释的。”游小默咽了咽口水，转头瞪了猫球一眼，你<t0/>个<t1/>臭小子，竟然告状，下次绝对不会再带你出去了。
“I can explain.” You XiaoMo swallowed thickly, turning his head to give CatQiu a glare. You tattle tale brat, see if I take you out anymore.
“我同伴他有点问题，你看他的表情就知道他很呆，所以我不能放他一个人去，这位朋友，再拖下去蛇毒会遍布我全身，你帮我传达一句话就好，届时我会禀明长老，他一定会重重的答谢你的。”

"There's a problem with my companion, you will know that he's stupid with one look at his face, so I can't leave him here by himself. This friend here, the snake venom would spread through my whole body if we drag this on any longer. Just help me convey a single sentence/word. I will convey your deed to my elder when the time comes, he would definitely thank you."
“我已经派人去通知会长，过不了多久他就会过来，你逃不了的。”<t0/>廖<t1/>牙见他不为所动，便继续说道。
"I've already sent people to inform the guild leader. He'll be here soon. You won't be able to run." Seeing him unmoved, Liao Ya continued to talk.
“我真的能遇到吗？”<t0/>天心仰起头<t1/>。
"Can I really meet that person?" Tian Xin looked up.
“我知道了。”
"Got it."
“我竟然又输给游小默了？”
“I lost to You XiaoMo again?”
“把那枚空间符标下。”
"Buy that teleportation talisman."
“是啊，你闭关的这段时间她天天到你门口看，我们看得出来，她应该是真的喜欢上你，就体谅她一下吧，我觉得她挺不容易的。”程向荣还以为他在伤心，不过他也挺同情天心的，喜欢错了人。

"Yeah. In the time you spent in isolation, she came to check up on you daily. We can tell that she really does like you. Try to forgive her; it hasn't been easy for her." Cheng XiangRong thought that he was sad about it all, but he sympathized with Tian Xin. She had just fell for the wrong person.
“是的。”男执事平静的说道。
"Yes," the male manager said calmly.
"Yup!"
“没想到阁下是个大饭桶，该不会饿了几百年吧，啧啧，活脱脱像个饿死鬼投胎。”麟昊武老大不高兴的讽剌道，特别是看到游小默一脸满足的样子。

"I did not expect that Your Excellency would be a big rice tub. Could it be that you've been starving for hundreds of ears. Tut tut, such a remarkable likeness to a reincarnated hungry ghost." Lin HaoWu-laoda (老大) unhappily mocked, particularly when he saw the look of satisfaction on You XiaoMo's face.
“游同学，还有半个月就是乙级学区一年一次的比赛，到时请加油哦！”
“Classmate You, ward B’s annual tournament is in half a month, good luck with it!”
“游震天来了。”凌霄紧皱眉毛，这种感觉他并不喜欢，看来提升实力的计划迫在眉睫。
"You ZhenTian is here." Ling Xiao tensely frowned. He did not like this sort of feeling, looks like the plan to raise his strength had to be urgently brought forward.
“滕蛟，不要跟他说废话，我们一起上吧！”
“Teng Jiao, let’s not waste our breath on him and take him down together!"
“看来你们师兄弟的感情不错。”游小默羡慕的说道。
"Seems like you have quite a good relationship with your martial brother," You XiaoMo commented, a little enviously.
“真是的，我本来打算暂时放过你们的。”
“Really now, and I had planned to have mercy on you.”
“眼尖嘴利。”男子轻哼一声。
"You have a silver tongue." The man huffed.
“知道了，大叔。”
"Got it, Uncle."
“等等！”
"Hold on!"
“脑子有病就去治，不知道有修为是不用吃饭的吗？
"Go treat your brain if you have a disease. Don't you know that those who cultivate don't need to eat?
“说不定他是因为喜欢你才欺负你的。”
"Maybe he bullies you because he likes you."
“说那个反应最剧烈的。”
"I'm speaking of the one with the most violent reaction."
“这一轮采取的依旧是淘汰赛，如果得分低于三分，比赛结<t0/>柬<t1/>后则自动淘汰，不能再继续参加第三轮。”叶长老看着众人若有所思的表情，继续说道：“当你们进入重力屋后，将会在门口正上方的墙壁上看到重力屋的记录，那是第一次进入重力屋前一百名的记录，而排在第一<t2/>名的，便是滕梓叶，他的时间是29分29秒……”

“This round, all those who have obtained less than three points will be eliminated, unable to advance to the third round.” Seeing everyone’s thoughtful expressions, Elder Ye continued, “Upon entering the Gravity Room, you will see the records for the Gravity Room above the doorway. Those are the top one hundred durations for first timers in the Gravity Room, and the one in first place is Teng ZiYe with a time of twenty-nine minutes and twenty-nine seconds…”
“这个实力完全可以角逐第一名了。”
“With his ability, he could take first place easily.”
“这是什么东西？”游小默好奇的问道。
"What's this?" You XiaoMo asked curiously.
“那个玄色一族来了没有？”
"Not a single one from that black colored clan came?"
“难道一定要有什么事才能找游同学吗？”青秋笑着反问道。
“Do I have to want something from you for me to talk to classmate You?” QingQiu retorted, smiling.
“靠，这不会是六级上品灵丹吧？”
“Fuck, this can’t be a high grade level six pill can it?” .
“麻烦你估一下价格。”游小默说。
"Could you evaluate them for me, please?"
“黑玉自然有，不过由于数量过于稀少，所以价格只高不低。”
"We definitely have black jade, but since it's very rare, it'll be expensive."
一个多时辰后，混战的结果终于出来了。
One hour later, the results of the battle royale were out.
一个晴朗万里无云的下午，他们终于等到熊笑派来的人，一个模样只有二十七八岁的男子，名于步。
On a clear, cloudless day, the person Xiong Xiao had sent finally arrived: a young man who seemed around twenty-seven or twenty-eight called Yu Bu.
一区排名榜第六的滕蛟，竟然才一个照面就被拿下了，这速度也未免太快了！
Block one’s number six Teng Jiao, was defeated in a single exchange. What terrifying speed!
一百个名单，只有前六十四名的记录是在25到30分钟之间，相差的间隔不大，有的甚至是在同一秒内。
On the list of a hundred, only the first sixty four had a record between twenty-five and thirty minutes. The times weren’t very far apart, some even in the same second.
一群人立刻拔出随身武器朝凌霄冲了过去，震耳欲聋的怒喊声，其中以滕家为最，任谁看到<t0/>自家主将被打得像死了一般都不会忍下这口气。

The horde of people pulled out their weapons and charged at Ling Xiao. Among the thunderous yells, the Teng family members were the loudest. Enraged at seeing their head get beaten like so, they wouldn’t hold back.
一股雄浑的灵魂之力出现在他头顶上，带着令人心悸的气息，居然幻化出一把巨大的长刀，狠狠的朝独眼刀疤头顶落下，与此同时，一丝不易察觉的灵魂之力亦悄无声息的流窜至他脚下。

A powerful burst of soul force appeared above his head with an aura that made people's hearts contract. That was when it transformed into a massive sword, mercilessly striking down towards One-Eyed Scarface's head. At the same time, a barely perceptible sliver of soul force darted out from under his feet.
一般来说，像这么珍贵的上品灵丹，要么以物易物，要么留着自己用或者交给拍卖会拍卖，而直接到铺子里换灵丹的绝对不超过两个，真要用两个字形容，那就是傻子。

Usually, for such a valuable high grade pill, it would be exchanged for an item of equal value, kept for personal use or actioned off at a large-scale auction. Going to a shop to sell it directly couldn't possibly yield as much as those options. If you had to describe such an action, it would be the words: utterly stupid.
一连见到在意的两族，游小默的注意力总算从点心分出来，虽然没有听到过程，但是看两人的表情就知道谁赢了。

Seeing the two clans that he had an interest in in succession, You XiaoMo's attention at long last was drawn away from the pastries. Although he had not heard the course of events, but seeing the two's expression, he immediately knew who had won.
一阵比滕梓心的灵丹更浓郁的药香味，甚至带着一股淡淡的波动从他的<t0/>炉鼎里传出<t1/>来。
A herbal fragrance even denser than Teng ZiXin’s pill wafted out from the cauldron with a light pulse.
三个月后，他的卡里重新攒了不少点数。
Three months later, the amount of points in his card had increased by not an insignificant amount.
